text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Ravi a cloud support engineer
from the RDS team here at the AWS office
in
Sydney today I'm going to show how you
can share manual Amazon relational
database Services snapshot or Amazon
Aurora DB cluster snapshots with another
account first open the Amazon RDS
console in the navigation pan choose
snapshots I'll be using RDS postgress
snapshot for demonstration find the
snapshot you want to share and then
select it choose action and then click
on share
snapshot I would like to highlight that
sharing a snapshot that are encrypted
with the default service key for RDS is
not supported next you can choose to
share your snapshot publicly or
privately if you choose public then any
AWS account can access the snapshot if
you choose private then only specific
accounts can access it to share your
snapshot with a specific account enter
the account ID with you want to share
the snapshot and then choose add you can
add up to 20 accounts choose save if you
no longer want to share your snapshot
with an account go to share snapshot
again then select the account and choose
delete choose save again to confirm your
changes and now you know how to share
manual Amazon relational database
service snapshot or Amazon Aurora DB
cluster snapshot with another
account thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
